Reviews.Title: wrong advertise 64 GB memory card come with canon bundle
Reviews.Author: vince
Reviews.Content: They advertise body Canon t51 with 64gb EXSPEED CLASS 10.They send me cheap 64gb (no name memory make in china) and they told me is is the same as EXSEED (look at the picture of the adv.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Eduardo Saleh
Reviews.Content: The camera is great. The LCD screen is very useful, it is easy to hold in your hand and the microphone is located upward, by the camera flash, so you can't involuntary cover it up with your finger. I upgraded from a T2i, and it is worthwhile, I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Excelent products
Reviews.Author: Alfredo Salgado
Reviews.Content: I have a good product for a good price and the delivery was good too. The t5i is a good option for the amateur people like me
